participant_1.background:
I'm always spilling drinks on myself at the beach, but I love it anyway.
i write in my spare time.
i like to build things.
wedding cakes are my specialty.
i m a veteran.

participant_2.background:
I was a country singer before I went into business.
i am a weirdo.
I'm lucky to have such a great dog to share my life with.
pizza is my most favorite thing.
I watched a lot of sports last year and kept my home clean and tidy.

content.text: Hi there! Doing well, thank you! How are you?
Doing great! I'm a veteran, and I like to build things. What do you like to do?
I was a country singer before I went into business, but now I'm a weirdo who watches a lot of sports.
That's cool! What kind of sports do you like to watch?
I love watching all kinds of sports, but my favorite is basketball. I also love watching football and baseball.
I love basketball too! I'm a big fan of the Golden State Warriors.
Oh, that's cool! I'm a fan of the Chicago Bulls.
Nice! I'm from California, so I'm a big fan of the Warriors.
I'm from Illinois, so I'm a big fan of the Bulls.
Have you been to any of their games?
I have been to a few Bulls games, but I've never been to a Warriors game.
You should come out to a Warriors game sometime! They're a lot of fun.
I would love to! I'll have to make a trip to California sometime.
You should! It's a great place to visit.
